data.name: Annihilate
data.description: You concentrate on your magical powers for up to 3 seconds, opening your body to serve as a vessel for the raw power of the Red Wind. The unleashed power will deal high corporeal damage each second to all enemies within 30 feet. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of combustion.

data.name: Boiling Blood
data.note:
Builds 5 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Causes your target to take low elemental damage over 10 seconds. When the effect ends, the victim will suffer medium-high corporeal damage.

data.name: Cauterize
data.note:
You must be Cursed, Hexed, or Ailing
Costs 20 combustion
data.description: You cause an open wound to sear itself shut, removing one hex, curse, or ailment from yourself.

data.name: Choking Smoke
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A hex which turns the air into unbreathable smoke and ash, dealing low corporeal damage to your target. The target becomes silenced for 3 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times and range are reduced by 50%.

data.name: Conflagration of Doom
data.description: A spot that you select bursts into flames for 8 seconds, dealing 200 damage each second to all enemies within 20 feet.

data.name: Detonate
data.description: You reach through the power of a hex on the target to instantly deal low elemental damage and an additional medium-low elemental damage over 9 seconds to them and all other enemies within 20 feet. You will gain 5 action points per target hit.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 action points. This effect can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Distracting Fires
data.description: Whenever you cast Smoke Screen or Fire Cage, you will gain 25% movement speed for 5 seconds but the build-up times of all your spells is increased by 0.5s.

data.name: Embrace The Flames
data.description: Gain 15 morale per second.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Grants a 160 unique bonus to intelligence.

data.name: Explosive Force
data.description: Any time that your Combustion causes an explosion, the blast will also deal medium-low elemental damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Fan The Flames
data.description: Increases the radii of Rain Of Fire and Detonate by 50%. Choking Smoke will now affect up to 9 additional enemies within 30ft of the target.

data.name: Fiery Blast
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You fling a massive ball of fire at 20 foot target area dealing medium-high elemental damage to up to 9 enemies. This ability will build-up while moving

data.name: Fiery Reserves
data.description: Flame Breath has its tick interval and duration reduced by 50%. In addition, whenever the effect ends on a target, you will gain 5 combustion and be healed for X.

data.name: Fire Cage
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are rooted as they become trapped within a cage of searing flames, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they are attacked.

data.name: Fireball
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You conjure up a fiery missile which slams into your target, dealing very-high elemental damage.

data.name: Fireball Barrage
data.description: You assault your target with a constant stream of fireballs, striking them up to 3 times over 3 seconds. Each blast deals medium elemental damage to your target and low elemental damage to up to 8 enemies within 20 feet of them. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of Combustion.

data.name: Fire Starter
data.description: Fireball and Fireball Barrage will now deal an additional medium elemental damage over 6 seconds.

data.name: Flame Breath
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You momentarily turn your very breath into a rolling burst of flames, dealing medium elemental damage over 12 seconds to up to 9 enemies in a cone in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Flames of Rhuin
data.description: An enchantment which infuses your groupmates within 100 feet of you with the spirit of fire for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional (20:150 + 0.2 INT) elemental damage any time they deal damage to a target.

data.name: Flashfire
data.description:
Whenever you spend Combustion, you will generate 1 stack of Flashfire, up to 3 stacks. The build-up time of Fireball is reduced by 50% if you have a stack of Flashfire, and Fireball will remove 1 stack whenever it deals damage

Fireball Barrage and Annihilate will only trigger this effect if they channel for at least 1.5 seconds.

data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50% and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fuel To The Fire
data.description: Boiling Blood now lasts for 5 seconds, no longer deals damage over time, and hits the target for very-high corporeal damage at the end of the effect.

data.name: Fueled From Within
data.description: Gain 5 action points per second. (Need to change this or devour energy)

data.name: Funnel Power
data.description: Whenever someone disrupts one of your spells, they take medium elemental damage and lose a (rank * 6) ability penalty to agility for 6 seconds. You will take medium-low elemental damage and gain 5 combustion. Use this ability again to turn it off.

data.name: Heart of Fire
data.description: Removes all hexes and curses from you. You regain 485 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Ignite
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A hex which causes your target to burst into flames, dealing medium-high corporeal damage to them over 9 seconds.

data.name: Ignition
data.description: The duration of Ignite is increased by 6 seconds and it will cause the enemy to take a (7.5 * rank) ability penalty to corporeal resistance for the duration.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Magic Dart
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Meltdown
data.description: You expel some of your built-up Combustion in a fiery blast, dealing medium-low corporeal damage.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Nova
data.note:
Builds 25 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A powerful spell which makes your target spontaneously combust, dealing medium elemental damage to them.

data.name: Playing With Fire
data.description: Deals medium corporeal damage to an enemy and then surrounds the target with hungry flames, causing all healing used on them for the next 6 seconds to become 75% less effective. This effect is removed if the target receives a direct heal.

data.name: Power From The Ashes
data.description: Meltdown will now cause you to deal 10% more damage for  seconds and generate 20 action points.

data.name: Pyroclastic Surge
data.description: A fountain of molten lava envelops your target, dealing low corporeal damage. You generate 40 action points.

data.name: Rain of Fire
data.description: You call down a shower of flames from the Winds Of Magic that rains down falling upon a spot you select and dealing low elemental damage to up to 9 enemies within 20 feet of that spot. You gain 3 action points every time someone takes damage from this ability.

data.name: Ruin And Destruction
data.description: Deals 448 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and reduces their Wounds by 180 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Scintillating Energy
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to your target and staggers them for 9 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Scorched Earth
data.description: You send a blast of heat into the ground around you, dealing medium-low elemental damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Searing Vitality
data.description: You will now heal for 10% of the damage you deal.

data.name: Shield of Aqshy
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of the Red Wind granting a 300 morale bonus to elemental resistance for 15 seconds. You will gain 20 combustion and 10 action points per second over the duration. This ability can only be activated when you have 100 combustion.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain 3% of you hit points as well. This can only happen once every second.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving it to you. Your target's intelligence will also be reduced by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Smoke Screen
data.description: You detaunt your target by surrounding them with thick smoke, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Smoldering Embers
data.description: Detonate will now spread Ignite, Fire Starter, and Flame Breath (if present) from the primary target to enemies within 20 feet of target.

data.name: Spreading Flames
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Deals very low elemental damage to your target over 3 seconds. At the end of the effect, the flames will spread to 4 other enemies within 20 feet and will deal 50% more damage. This ability will spread this way from each target up to 4 times for a total of 15 second duration.

data.name: Stop, Drop, And Roll
data.description: You grasp the enemey in fire causing them to explode with concussive force, dealing very high corporeal damage to your target over 3 seconds.

data.name: Tangling Cage
data.description: Fire Cage will now snare targets by 50% for 5 seconds and prevent them from using root breaker abilities.

data.name: The Burning Head
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to you target, and 1200 to all other enemies within 20 feet of them. All enemies hit by this effect will lose 600 points of Morale.

data.name: Unleash the Winds
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and knocks them away from you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to spirit resistance and a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistance.

data.name: Wall of Fire
data.description: A wall of fire shoots outwards from you and remains on the ground for 8 seconds, dealing 200 damage each second to all enemies in a line in front of you up to 65 feet away from you.

data.name: Wildfire
data.description: When an enemy is damaged by Scorched Earth or Rain of Fire, they will become covered in flames, receiving medium elemental damage over 8 seconds.

data.name: Combustion
data.description:
00-24: +00% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 00% chance of explosion.
25-49: +10% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 10% chance of explosion.
50-74: +20% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 25% chance of explosion.
75-99: +30% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 50% chance of explosion.
100: +40% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 100% chance of explosion.

Explosions deal (40/300 + 0.5INT) elemental damage to the caster and can critically hit.
